short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to display Plurks like the Twitter media mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 幫助你在噗浪也可以使用像是推特的圖片顯示模式。Enhance your Plurk browsing experience with the "Plurk Media Mode" extension, a powerful tool designed to tailor your feed to show only the content you love. Our extension is specifically crafted for users who prefer visual content, allowing you to filter and display only those Plurks that contain images. Say goodbye to endless scrolling through text-only posts and hello to a visually enriched Plurk timeline.
